FROM ( SELECT id, `name`, address, lon, lat, province, city, county,
IF (t3.rate, t3.rate, 0.00) AS rate,
IF (t4.service, t4.service, 0) AS service, <% if(!isEmpty(lat) && !isEmpty(lon)){ %> ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * asin( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #$lat$# * PI() / 180 - lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS(#$lat$# * PI() / 180) * COS(lat * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #$lon$# * PI() / 180 - lon * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance <% } else { %> '未知' AS distance <% } %> FROM store t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.store, ROUND(t1.great / t2.`all` * 100, 2) AS rate FROM ( SELECT store, COUNT(*) AS great FROM store_eval WHERE grade < 3 GROUP BY store ) t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT store, COUNT(*) AS `all` FROM store_eval GROUP BY store ) t2 ON t1.store = t2.store ) t3 ON t1.id = t3.store LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b_id AS store, COUNT(*) AS service FROM `order` WHERE `status` = 3 GROUP BY b_id ) t4 ON t1.id = t4.store )t ORDER BY distance
